title: Does history 'exist' before philosophy (history of philosophy)? - Quora

response.answer_text: Nice question. As a slight change of perspective before launching upon this complex question, I would suggest that rather than thinking about the “history of philosophy”, you might instead think upon the “philosophy of history” instead. The manner in which you conceptualize this project—that of a “philosophy of history”—will, I suspect, facilitate your answer to the original question.
